name: getnfts_metadata
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nfts_by_address.
Tool description: Get all NFTs owned by an address at scale
API description: Fetches the metadata, attributes, and enclosed media of a specific NFT.

contractaddress.description: Address of the NFT contract (e.g., "0xb47e3cd837ddf8e4c57f05d70ab865de6e193bbb" for Bored Apes).

tokenid.description: The ID of the NFT token.
